subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Lakers forward Metta World Peace was suspended seven games by the N.B.A. on Tuesday for elbowing James Harden, meaning he could miss six playoff games.
snippet: Los Angeles Lakers forward Metta World Peace was suspended seven games by the N.B.A. on Tuesday for elbowing James Harden, meaning he could miss six playoff games.
